title: How to play League of Legends

embed.description: Hey guys, I hope this taught you a thing or two about the game Don't forget to like, comment and subscribe to become a G! Follow my twitch to see when I go live https://www.twitch.tv/gothnam

body:
Hi guys,
i have decided to make a video on how to play LoL since there hasn't been any new tutorials with the new client. So I decided to put a video to help anybody that wants to learn how to play this game :) Please check it out and let me know what you think!
thanks

replies.body: Nice video :) Keep up the good work
